name: Lossy Weighty
description:
In this fantasy tappy runner game you have to help Ms. Lossy drop some weighty.

Run, jump, collect coins for GYM button.
Avoid oily evil french fries and creamy donuts.
Use GYM button to destroy all monsters.
Don't forget to eat broccoli for infinite jumps,
and red pepper so you can beat all monsters on your way.
